trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Grawley needs estimates and he needs them now.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_TODO_00<tab>Request supply estimates from the villagers.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_000<tab>Listen, friend, I'm run off my feet here. I need someone to take stock of our remaining food stores, and you just volunteered.

TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_002<tab>Nigh everything this village needs to survive is hauled up from the lowlands, and if matters don't settle down soon... Well, I won't be surprised when Wright and Stilltide begin hoarding goods instead of selling 'em. Not unless it's for an outrageous price.

TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_003<tab>Anyway, that's enough speculation. I need estimates─accurate estimates, mind you─from them what's in charge of our edibles. Grains, grog, and meats. Off you hop.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_005<tab>Grains, grog, and meats. Speak to the villagers and find out what we've got left...

TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAIN03543_000_010<tab>Grawley wants an estimate? Well you can tell him, “Not bloody much.” We'll need to think of something 'cause we're runnin' low on both grain <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> beans...

TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAIN03543_000_011<tab>Grawley wants an estimate? Well you can tell him, “Not bloody much.” We'll need to think of something 'cause we're runnin' low on both grain <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> beans...

TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_ZUMIESHAI_000_012<tab><sigh> We've put a good dent in the liquor we got from the dwarves, so we might have to make do with water at some point. At least we've a fresh source with the river nearby.

TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_ZUMIESHAI_000_013<tab><sigh> We've put a good dent in the liquor we got from the dwarves, so we might have to make do with water at some point. At least we've a fresh source with the river nearby.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_WALMET_000_014<tab>Hmmm. I'd say we have more than enough dried meat to go around. There was peril in the hunt, but the haul was plentiful.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_WALMET_000_015<tab>Hmmm. I'd say we have more than enough dried meat to go around. There was peril in the hunt, but the haul was plentiful.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_021<tab>...Grain is a problem, then. I'll see if we can't trade our surplus meat in Wright for a few sacks of barley and the like.
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_022<tab>That will get us through for the moment, but we'll need to come up with a long-term plan...
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_024<tab>...Well, I'll think of something. Thanks for doing the legwork, friend! Say, have you ever considered taking up work as a quartermaster...?
